meanings.definition: Capable of being climbed or ascended.
meanings.sent1: The small hill was easily mountable by the children.
meanings.sent2: The ladder was sturdy and mountable to reach the top shelf.
meanings.sent3: The cat found the mountable tree irresistible for its daily adventures.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was as mountable as the highest peak she aimed to conquer.
meanings.sent5: The mountable rock face challenged even the most experienced climbers.

meanings.definition: Able to be attached or fixed to a surface.
meanings.sent1: The mountable hook securely held the picture frame on the wall.
meanings.sent2: The mountable shelf was perfect for organizing books in the study.
meanings.sent3: The mountable magnet on the fridge kept the shopping list in place.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was as mountable as the strongest adhesive, never wavering.
meanings.sent5: The mountable clamp firmly secured the pieces together during the project.

meanings.sent3: The mountable podium made even the shyest speaker feel confident.
